Mrs. Williams

Parent Survey. . .
Gold-Burg ISD is working to achieve Level 1 certification under Robert Marzano's High-Reliability Schools framework. Level one certification ensures "A Safe and Collaborative Culture," and we need input from the household of each family represented in our school in order to know how we are doing. We want to continuously improve to ensure the safety of our students and staff. We also want to maintain a collaborative environment, where input from students, parents, community members, and school staff is valued.

If you are the parent/guardian of a Gold-Burg student, please take 5 minutes to complete the "Safe and Collaborative" survey. We only need one survey from each family. You may see this survey posted in other media in an effort to canvas all stakeholders of Gold-Burg ISD. However, we only need one person from each family to submit a survey, no matter how many students you have enrolled at Gold-Burg. We thank you for your input and your time.

Click here to access the survey . . .
